attributes.action: A inquiry of the government borrowing and spending
attributes.additional_details: After TWO years of the coalition took power the government are STILL blaming the previous government for everything . surely after two years they should know what we are borrowing and spending and why we are STILL HAVING CUTBACKS. HOW MUCH MORE DOES THIS COALITION GOVERNMENT THINK WE THE HARD WORKING PEOPLE OF THE UK CAN TAKE AS IT JUST SEEMS THEY ARE PROTECTING THE RICH AND SCREWING THE WORKING CLASS AND THE POOR .THEY ARE MAKING UNEMPLOYMENT AS THE COSTS OF FUEL PRICE HIKES AND THE COST OF GAS AND ELECTRIC GOING UP AS WELL AS FOOD BILL. WE NEED A GOVERNMENT THAT WILL TAKE THE REINS AND GET US OUT NOT MAKE US LINGER IN THIS RECESSION IF THEY CAN'T DO IT THEN LET US VOTE FOR A GOVERNMENT THAT CAN !!!
